column5: I am looking at getting a fish finder for my project boat and would like some advice I do all around fishing for quite a few species and some big water, the gps for navigation is great so I am looking for a heads up on the units listed or if you know of another one in the price range let me know bonuses or drawbacks  Thanks  Nelson
Don't know anything about the others, but you can never go wrong with an Eagle/Lowrance product they stand behind their equipment.
